contentList.content: Magical Staves or Coda contain enough power to cast a number of spells per day. The higher a spells rank, the more power it will consume.
Magical Staves or Coda contain enough power to cast a number of spells per day. The higher a spells rank, the more power it will consume.
An array of dazzling gemstones lines the twisting head of the ebony staff.
A tempest staff is usually crafted from the wood of a tree struck by lightning. It's often gnarled with the occasional spark of electricity flashing from its length.

When the people of Kyonin discovered fiendish threats in their homeland, a group of priests traveled across the world to help. They chose to leave Fiendbreaker behind in Kyonin to help protect them from future demonic threats.
This staff is topped with carved animal and monster heads.
Carved from white ash wood, a staff of air crackles with electrical sparks, and a breeze always follows the wielder.
A multi-hued array of scales covers a dragonprism staff, forming a gradient of color, and a dragon's claw holds a gem upon the staff's head. Dragons give allies these staves as a mark of esteem.
A boreal staffs core is chiseled from a cylinder of ice to form a spiky, jagged icicle, its surface gleaming with the colors of the northern lights.
Geometric patterns are etched into the smooth brown and gray surface of a staff of earth, which makes a solid thud whenever tapped against the ground.
This white wood staff is capped at each end with a golden cross adorned with ruby cabochons.

Unlike their father, Thibault, Cherish Hollow was not afraid of zombies. Cherish was afraid of sharks, liquorice, wallpaper, Netherese artefacts, hats (large), the outdoors, the indoors, hats (small), and milk pails. Zombies were a bloody picnic.

Carved in circles across the knob of the staff are different words for thunder. Gnomish, Sylvan, Elvish, Celestial, even the Primordial tongue - all of these and more fuse together to form the thunderword.
This twisted and grim-looking staff is adorned with hideous skull and bone motifs.
This handheld snare drum is adorned with garish scenes of battle and triumph. When played, no matter what rhythm, it always gives the impression of a marching beat, invoking armies on the move.
This handheld snare drum is adorned with frightful scenes of battle and triumph. When played, no matter what rhythm, it always gives the impression of a marching beat, invoking armies on the move.
This handheld snare drum is adorned with heroic scenes of battle and triumph. When played, no matter what rhythm, it always gives the impression of a marching beat, invoking armies on the move.
This flute is made of what seems to be cracked wood bound by frayed leather and looks like it shouldn't function at all, but in skilled hands it emits a beautiful sound that beguiles the senses.
This flute is made of what seems to be cracked wood bound by frayed leather and looks like it shouldn't function at all, but in skilled hands it emits a beautiful sound that beguiles the senses.
While those who appreciate lute may like the sound of this light oaken instrument, its real purpose is to sow turmoil against a performer's enemies, spreading discord with each note.
While those who appreciate lute may like the sound of this light pine instrument, its real purpose is to sow turmoil against a performer's enemies, spreading discord with each note.
While those who appreciate lute may like the sound of this dark walnut instrument, its real purpose is to sow turmoil against a performer's enemies, spreading discord with each note.
Carved from white ash wood, a staff of air crackles with electrical sparks, and a breeze always follows the wielder.
Carved from white ash wood, a staff of air crackles with electrical sparks, and a breeze always follows the wielder.
This staff is topped with carved animal and monster heads.
This staff is topped with carved animal and monster heads.
An array of dazzling gemstones lines the twisting head of the ebony staff.
An array of dazzling gemstones lines the twisting head of the ebony staff.
This twisted and grim-looking staff is adorned with hideous skull and bone motifs.
This white wood staff is capped at each end with a golden cross adorned with ruby cabochons.
This white wood staff is capped at each end with a golden cross adorned with ruby cabochons.
A boreal staffs core is chiseled from a cylinder of ice to form a spiky, jagged icicle, its surface gleaming with the colors of the northern lights.
Geometric patterns are etched into the smooth brown and gray surface of a staff of earth, which makes a solid thud whenever tapped against the ground.
Geometric patterns are etched into the smooth brown and gray surface of a staff of earth, which makes a solid thud whenever tapped against the ground.

Carved in circles across the knob of the staff are different words for thunder. Gnomish, Sylvan, Elvish, Celestial, even the Primordial tongue - all of these and more fuse together to form the thunderword.

Carved in circles across the knob of the staff are different words for thunder. Gnomish, Sylvan, Elvish, Celestial, even the Primordial tongue - all of these and more fuse together to form the thunderword.
A tempest staff is usually crafted from the wood of a tree struck by lightning. It's often gnarled with the occasional spark of electricity flashing from its length.
This collar is a silken cord from which hangs a small golden amulet that bears a likeness to a beetle known for stealing voices.
This flute is made of what seems to be cracked wood bound by frayed leather and looks like it shouldn't function at all, but in skilled hands it emits a beautiful sound that beguiles the senses.
This staff resembles a blackened and burned length of ashen wood.
This staff resembles a blackened and burned length of ashen wood.
This staff resembles a blackened and burned length of ashen wood.
This oak branch grows leaves in spring that change color in autumn and shed in winter.
This oak branch grows leaves in spring that change color in autumn and shed in winter.

The gentle tap-tap-tap of a staff on stone sparked terror for all in Cazador's palace. It signalled an approaching storm, and all they could do was shrink into the background and pray its wrath would not fall on them.
A staff of water is most often made of driftwood and features a wave pattern. The staff smells of rain or brine.

Range 60 feet
Targets 1 creature
Defense AC
You call forth a powerful blast of pressurized water that bludgeons the target and knocks it back. Make a ranged spell attack roll.
Critical Success The target takes 6d6 bludgeoning damage and is knocked back 10 feet.
Success The target takes 3d6 bludgeoning damage and is knocked back 5 feet.
Heightened (+1) The bludgeoning damage increases by 2d6.
Call forth rain or destroy a water-based surface.
Call forth rain. It extinguishes exposed flames and forms a water surface.
Cause water-based surfaces (such as water, steam, ice, blood, and poison) to vanish.
A staff of water is most often made of driftwood and features a wave pattern. The staff smells of rain or brine.
A staff of water is most often made of driftwood and features a wave pattern. The staff smells of rain or brine.

2 Actions
Range 60 feet
Targets 1 creature
Defense basic Fortitude
An orb of biting cold coalesces around your target, freezing its body. The target takes 2d4 cold damage with a basic Fortitude save. On a critical failure, the target also gains weakness 1 to bludgeoning until the start of your next turn.
Heightened (+1) The damage increases by 1d4 and the weakness on a critical failure increases by 1.

3 Actions
Range 120 feet
Area 20-foot burst
Duration 1 minute
You call forth a cloud of mist. All creatures within the mist become concealed, and all creatures outside the mist become concealed to creatures within it. You can Dismiss the cloud.

2 Actions
Area 30-foot Cone
Defense basic Reflex
You summon a crashing wave that sweeps away from you. You deal 6d6 bludgeoning damage to creatures in the area. The water also extinguishes non-magical fires in the area.
Heightened (+1) The damage increases by 2d6.

2 Actions
A powerful geyser blasts up from the ground, potentially pushing creatures on top of it into the air. The bottom of this spell's area must be on solid ground. Each creature in the area takes 3d6 bludgeoning damage and 4d6 fire damage, with a Reflex save. A creature pushed into the air by the geyser can't be pushed beyond the top of the geyser. After being pushed into the air, a creature falls unless it's flying or has some other means of staying aloft, taking falling damage (normally equal to half the distance it fell). After the geyser erupts, its area is filled with a cloud of steam for 1 round. All creatures in the steam are concealed, and all creatures outside the steam are concealed to creatures within it.
Success The creature takes half damage and isn't pushed into the air.
Failure The creature takes full damage and is pushed 20 feet into the air.
Heightened (+1) The damage increases by 1d6 bludgeoning and 1d6 fire.

2 Actions
Area 60-foot Line
Defense Fortitude
A swirling torrent of water manifests along a straight line, battering creatures and unattended objects in its path and possibly pushing them away from you. The torrent deals 8d6 bludgeoning damage. Each creature in the area must attempt a basic Fortitude save; unattended objects automatically fail. Creatures and objects that fail are also knocked back 5 feet (10 feet on a critical failure).
Heightened (+1) The damage increases by 2d6.

A gout of flame sprays from your mouth. You deal 2d6 fire damage to creatures in the area with a basic Reflex save.
Heightened (+1) The damage increases by 2d6.

A gout of flame sprays from your mouth. You deal 2d6 fire damage to creatures in the area with a basic Reflex save.
Heightened (+1) The damage increases by 2d6.

2 Actions
Range 30 feet or Melee
Targets 1 creature
Defense AC
You snap your fingers and point at a target, which begins to smolder. Make a spell attack roll against the target's AC, dealing 2d4 fire damage on a hit. If the target is within your melee reach, you can choose to make a melee spell attack with the flame instead of a ranged spell attack, which increases all the spell's damage dice to d6s.
Critical Success The target takes double damage and 1d4 persistent fire damage.
Success The target takes full damage.
Heightened (+1) The initial damage increases by 1d4 and the persistent fire damage on a critical hit increases by 1d4.

2 Actions
Range 30 feet or Melee
Targets 1 creature
Defense AC
You snap your fingers and point at a target, which begins to smolder. Make a spell attack roll against the target's AC, dealing 2d4 fire damage on a hit. If the target is within your melee reach, you can choose to make a melee spell attack with the flame instead of a ranged spell attack, which increases all the spell's damage dice to d6s.
Critical Success The target takes double damage and 1d4 persistent fire damage.
Success The target takes full damage.
Heightened (+1) The initial damage increases by 1d4 and the persistent fire damage on a critical hit increases by 1d4.

2 Actions
Range 30 feet or Melee
Targets 1 creature
Defense AC
You snap your fingers and point at a target, which begins to smolder. Make a spell attack roll against the target's AC, dealing 2d4 fire damage on a hit. If the target is within your melee reach, you can choose to make a melee spell attack with the flame instead of a ranged spell attack, which increases all the spell's damage dice to d6s.
Critical Success The target takes double damage and 1d4 persistent fire damage.
Success The target takes full damage.
Heightened (+1) The initial damage increases by 1d4 and the persistent fire damage on a critical hit increases by 1d4.
Shoot a bright flame from your fingers that explodes upon contact, torching everything in the vicinity.

3 Actions
You raise a blazing wall that burns creatures passing through it. You create either a 5-foot-thick wall of flame in a straight line up to 60 feet long and 10 feet high, or a 5-foot-thick, 10-foot-radius ring of flame with the same height. The wall stands vertically in either form; if you wish, the wall can be of a shorter length or height. Everything on each side of the wall is concealed from creatures on the opposite side. Any creature that crosses the wall or is occupying the wall's area at the start of its turn takes 4d6 fire damage.
You can touch the tip of this staff to a torch, tinder, or a flammable substance to ignite a flame
You slash your hand through the air, channeling miniature ripples of air from each finger to slice your enemy.

2 Actions
Duration 1 hour
The wind at your back pushes you to find new horizons. You gain a +10-foot status bonus to your Speed.

3 Actions
Range 120 feet
Area 20-foot burst
Saving Throw Fortitude
Duration 1 minute
You summon a tumultuous cloud of ash and smoke. Creatures that start their turn within the cloud take 2d4 fire damage as their lungs fill with the hot, acrid smoke, with a Fortitude save.

A violent wind issues forth from your palm, blowing from the point where you are when you Cast the Spell to the line's opposite end. The wind extinguishes small non-magical fires, disperses fog and mist, blows objects of light Bulk or less around, and pushes larger objects.
Success The creature can't move against the wind.
Failure The creature is knocked prone.

You slash your hand through the air, channeling miniature ripples of air from each finger to slice your enemy. If you have two hands free, you can target two creatures with this spell; otherwise, you target one.
Make a spell attack roll against each target's AC. This deals 2d4 slashing damage. On a critical success, a target also takes 1d4 persistent bleed damage. If you're attacking two creatures, this counts as two attacks for your multiple attack penalty, but the penalty doesn't increase until after both attacks.
Critical Success The target takes double damage and 1d4 persistent bleed damage.
Heightened (+1) The damage increases by 1d4, and the persistent damage on a critical hit increases by 1d4.

2 Actions
Range touch
Targets 1 creature
The target can soar through the air, gaining a fly Speed equal to its Speed or 20 feet, whichever is greater.

2 Actions
Area 120-foot line
basic Reflex
A bolt of lightning strikes outward from your hand, dealing 4d12 electricity damage with a basic Reflex save.
Heightened (+1) The damage increases by 1d12.

2 Actions
Saving Throw basic Reflex
Superheated air collects under you, buoying you high into the sky before you plummet back down in a fiery comet. You Fly 15 feet straight up into the air, then Fly in a straight line to an empty space of your choice on the ground within 60 feet. When you land, the blistering air blasts out from you, dealing 3d4 bludgeoning damage and 3d6 fire damage (basic Reflex save) to all creatures in a 10-foot emanation.
Heightened (+1) The damage increases by 1d4 bludgeoning and 1d6 fire.
Replenish <LSTag Tooltip="CosmicOmen">staff charges</LSTag> by expending <LSTag Tooltip="SpellSlot">spell slots</LSTag> outside of combat. Usable once per day.
Recover [1] <LSTag Tooltip="CosmicOmen">staff charge</LSTag> by expending a Rank [1] <LSTag Tooltip="SpellSlot">spell slots</LSTag>.
Recover [1] <LSTag Tooltip="CosmicOmen">staff charges</LSTag> by expending a Rank [1] <LSTag Tooltip="SpellSlot">spell slots</LSTag>.

Replenish staff charges by expending spell slots outside of combat. Usable once per day.
Replenish staff charges by expending spell slots outside of combat. Usable once per day.
Replenish staff charges by expending spell slots outside of combat. Usable once per day.
Replenish staff charges by expending spell slots outside of combat. Usable once per day.
Replenish staff charges by expending spell slots outside of combat. Usable once per day.
Replenish staff charges by expending spell slots outside of combat. Usable once per day.
Recover [1] <LSTag Tooltip="CosmicOmen">staff charges</LSTag> by expending <LSTag Tooltip="SpellSlot">spell slots</LSTag>. Can only be used once per day.
Recover [1] <LSTag Tooltip="CosmicOmen">staff charge</LSTag> by expending a Rank [1] <LSTag Tooltip="SpellSlot">spell slots</LSTag>.
Create [1] <LSTag Tooltip="CosmicOmen">staff charges</LSTag> by expending a Rank [1] <LSTag Tooltip="SpellSlot">spell slot</LSTag>.
Create [1] <LSTag Tooltip="CosmicOmen">staff charges</LSTag> by expending a Rank [1] <LSTag Tooltip="SpellSlot">spell slot</LSTag>.

Create [1] <LSTag Type="ActionResource" Tooltip="CosmicOmen">staff charge</LSTag> by expending a Rank [1] <LSTag Tooltip="SpellSlot">spell slot</LSTag>. Once per <LSTag Tooltip="LongRest">long rest</LSTag>.
Create <LSTag Tooltip="CosmicOmen">staff charges</LSTag> by expending <LSTag Tooltip="SpellSlot">spell slots</LSTag>.
Create <LSTag Tooltip="CosmicOmen">staff charges</LSTag> by expending <LSTag Tooltip="SpellSlot">spell slots</LSTag>. Can only be used once per day, outside of combat.
Create [1] <LSTag Tooltip="CosmicOmen">staff charges</LSTag> by expending a Rank [1] <LSTag Tooltip="SpellSlot">spell slot</LSTag>.
Create [1] <LSTag Tooltip="CosmicOmen">staff charges</LSTag> by expending a Rank [1] <LSTag Tooltip="SpellSlot">spell slot</LSTag>.
While wielding this staff, you gain a +1 bonus to your Fortitude and Reflex saves.
You can touch the tip of this staff to a flammable substance or object to ignite a flame.

2 Actions
Area 15-foot Cone
Defense Reflex
A spray of heavy rocks flies through the air in front of you. The rubble deals 2d4 bludgeoning damage to each creature in the area. Each creature must attempt a Reflex save.
Success The creature takes half damage.
Failure The creature takes full damage and is pushed 5 feet away from you.
Critical Failure The creature takes double damage and is pushed 10 feet away from you.
Heightened (+1) The damage increases by 2d4.

3 Actions
Range 60 feet
Area 15-foot burst
Duration 1 minute
Thick, clinging mud covers the ground, 1 foot deep. The mud is difficult terrain.
Evoke rocks to bludgeon and create difficult terrain.

2 Actions
Range 120 feet
Targets 1 creature
Defense Fortitude
Duration varies
Using the weight of earth, you hamper a target's flight, with effects based on its Fortitude save.
Failure The target can't Fly, levitate, or otherwise leave the ground for 1 round.
Critical Failure The target can't Fly, levitate, or otherwise leave the ground for 1 minute.
Grant the aspect of sand. The target gains resistance [1] to piercing and slashing damage, and cannot bleed. The spell ends after resisting [2] attacks.

Range 60 feet
Targets 1 creature
Defense AC
You call forth a powerful blast of pressurized water that bludgeons the target and knocks it back. Make a ranged spell attack roll.
Critical Success The target takes 6d6 bludgeoning damage and is knocked back 10 feet.
Success The target takes 3d6 bludgeoning damage and is knocked back 5 feet.
Heightened (+1) The bludgeoning damage increases by 2d6.

Range 60 feet
Targets 1 creature
Defense AC
You call forth a powerful blast of pressurized water that bludgeons the target and knocks it back. Make a ranged spell attack roll.
Critical Success The target takes 6d6 bludgeoning damage and is knocked back 10 feet.
Success The target takes 3d6 bludgeoning damage and is knocked back 5 feet.
Heightened (+1) The bludgeoning damage increases by 2d6.

Targets 1 creature
Defense AC
You call forth a powerful blast of pressurized water that bludgeons the target and knocks it back. Make a ranged spell attack roll.
Critical Success The target takes 6d6 bludgeoning damage and is knocked back 10 feet.
Success The target takes 3d6 bludgeoning damage and is knocked back 5 feet.
Heightened (+1) The bludgeoning damage increases by 2d6.

Targets 1 creature
Defense AC

Success The target takes 3d6 bludgeoning damage and is knocked back 5 feet.
Heightened (+1) The bludgeoning damage increases by 2d6.

Area 30-foot Cone
Defense basic Reflex
You summon a crashing wave that sweeps away from you. You deal 6d6 bludgeoning damage to creatures in the area. The water also extinguishes non-magical fires in the area.
Heightened (+1) The damage increases by 2d6.

Area 30-foot Cone
Defense basic Reflex
You summon a crashing wave that sweeps away from you. You deal 6d6 bludgeoning damage to creatures in the area. The water also extinguishes non-magical fires in the area.
Heightened (+1) The damage increases by 2d6.

Targets 1 creature
Defense AC
You call forth a powerful blast of pressurized water that bludgeons the target and knocks it back. Make a ranged spell attack roll.
Critical Success The target takes 6d6 bludgeoning damage and is knocked back 10 feet.
Success The target takes 3d6 bludgeoning damage and is knocked back 5 feet.
Heightened (+1) The bludgeoning damage increases by 2d6.
This staff contains a variety of water spells.

2 Actions
Area 30-foot Cone
Defense basic Reflex
You summon a crashing wave that sweeps away from you. You deal 6d6 bludgeoning damage to creatures in the area. The water also extinguishes non-magical fires in the area.
Heightened (+1) The damage increases by 2d6.

Create [1] <LSTag Type="ActionResource" Tooltip="CosmicOmen">staff charge</LSTag> by expending a Rank [1] <LSTag Tooltip="SpellSlot">spell slot</LSTag>. Once per <LSTag Tooltip="LongRest">long rest</LSTag>.
Shoot a bright flame from your fingers that explodes upon contact, torching everything in the vicinity.
Shoot a bright flame from your fingers that explodes upon contact, torching everything in the vicinity.

A gout of flame sprays from your mouth. You deal 2d6 fire damage to creatures in the area with a basic Reflex save.
Heightened (+1) The damage increases by 2d6.

2 Actions
Area 15-foot Cone
Defense Reflex
A spray of heavy rocks flies through the air in front of you. The rubble deals 2d4 bludgeoning damage to each creature in the area. Each creature must attempt a Reflex save.
Success The creature takes half damage.
Failure The creature takes full damage and is pushed 5 feet away from you.
Critical Failure The creature takes double damage and is pushed 10 feet away from you.
Heightened (+1) The damage increases by 2d4.

2 Actions
Area 120-foot line
basic Reflex
A bolt of lightning strikes outward from your hand, dealing 4d12 electricity damage with a basic Reflex save.
Heightened (+1) The damage increases by 1d12.

2 Actions
Area 30-foot Cone
Defense basic Reflex
You summon a crashing wave that sweeps away from you. You deal 6d6 bludgeoning damage to creatures in the area. The water also extinguishes non-magical fires in the area.
Heightened (+1) The damage increases by 2d6.

2 Actions
Area 15-foot cone
Defense Reflex
You create a wave of energy that ripples through the earth. Terrestrial creatures in the affected area must attempt a Reflex save to avoid stumbling as the shockwave shakes the ground.
Success The creature is flat-footed until the start of its next turn.
Failure The creature falls prone.
Critical Failure As failure, plus the creature takes 1d6 damage.
Heightened (+1) The area increases by 5 feet (to a 20-foot cone at 2nd level, and so on).

Range 60 feet
Targets 1 creature
Defense AC
You call forth a powerful blast of pressurized water that bludgeons the target and knocks it back. Make a ranged spell attack roll.
Critical Success The target takes 6d6 bludgeoning damage and is knocked back 10 feet.
Success The target takes 3d6 bludgeoning damage and is knocked back 5 feet.
Heightened (+1) The bludgeoning damage increases by 2d6.

2 Actions
A thin crack rips through the earth, erupting with magma, then swiftly seals up. Each creature along the line and on solid ground takes 4d6 bludgeoning damage and 6d6 fire damage with a Reflex save.
Success The creature takes half damage.
Failure The creature takes full damage, and it falls prone.
Heightened (+1) The damage increases by 1d6 bludgeoning and 1d6 fire.
Raise a wall of non-magical, solid stone.

Range 60 feet
Targets 1 creature
Defense AC
You call forth a powerful blast of pressurized water that bludgeons the target and knocks it back. Make a ranged spell attack roll.
Critical Success The target takes 6d6 bludgeoning damage and is knocked back 10 feet.
Success The target takes 3d6 bludgeoning damage and is knocked back 5 feet.
Heightened (+1) The bludgeoning damage increases by 2d6.

2 Actions
Area 30-foot Cone
Defense basic Reflex
You summon a crashing wave that sweeps away from you. You deal 6d6 bludgeoning damage to creatures in the area. The water also extinguishes non-magical fires in the area.
Heightened (+1) The damage increases by 2d6.

A gout of flame sprays from your mouth. You deal 2d6 fire damage to creatures in the area with a basic Reflex save.
Heightened (+1) The damage increases by 2d6.

2 Actions
Area 15-foot Cone
Defense Reflex
A spray of heavy rocks flies through the air in front of you. The rubble deals 2d4 bludgeoning damage to each creature in the area. Each creature must attempt a Reflex save.
Success The creature takes half damage.
Failure The creature takes full damage and is pushed 5 feet away from you.
Critical Failure The creature takes double damage and is pushed 10 feet away from you.
Heightened (+1) The damage increases by 2d4.

2 Actions
Area 120-foot line
basic Reflex
A bolt of lightning strikes outward from your hand, dealing 4d12 electricity damage with a basic Reflex save.
Heightened (+1) The damage increases by 1d12.

3 Actions
Range 120 feet
Area 20-foot burst
Saving Throw Fortitude
Duration 1 minute
You summon a tumultuous cloud of ash and smoke. Creatures that start their turn within the cloud take 2d4 fire damage as their lungs fill with the hot, acrid smoke, with a Fortitude save.

3 Actions
Range 120 feet
Area 20-foot burst
Saving Throw Fortitude
Duration 1 minute
You summon a tumultuous cloud of ash and smoke. Creatures that start their turn within the cloud take 2d4 fire damage as their lungs fill with the hot, acrid smoke, with a Fortitude save.

2 Actions
Range 60 feet
Area 20-foot burst
Defense basic Reflex
Duration 1 minute
Sharp flowstone formations protrude from the ground and ceiling, dealing 6d6 piercing damage to creatures in the area with a basic Reflex save. Densely packed with protrusions, the area becomes difficult terrain for the duration. The protrusions turn to dust when the spell ends. You can Dismiss the spell.
Heightened (+1) The damage increases by 2d6.

2 Actions
Saving Throw basic Reflex
Superheated air collects under you, buoying you high into the sky before you plummet back down in a fiery comet. You Fly 15 feet straight up into the air, then Fly in a straight line to an empty space of your choice on the ground within 60 feet. When you land, the blistering air blasts out from you, dealing 3d4 bludgeoning damage and 3d6 fire damage (basic Reflex save) to all creatures in a 10-foot emanation.
Heightened (+1) The damage increases by 1d4 bludgeoning and 1d6 fire.

2 Actions
Saving Throw basic Reflex
Superheated air collects under you, buoying you high into the sky before you plummet back down in a fiery comet. You Fly 15 feet straight up into the air, then Fly in a straight line to an empty space of your choice on the ground within 60 feet. When you land, the blistering air blasts out from you, dealing 3d4 bludgeoning damage and 3d6 fire damage (basic Reflex save) to all creatures in a 10-foot emanation.
Heightened (+1) The damage increases by 1d4 bludgeoning and 1d6 fire.
A boreal staffs core is chiseled from a cylinder of ice to form a spiky, jagged icicle, its surface gleaming with the colors of the northern lights.
A tempest staff is usually crafted from the wood of a tree struck by lightning. It's often gnarled with the occasional spark of electricity flashing from its length.
This staff grants a bonus [1] HP anytime you heal yourself or others.
You restore an additional [1] every time you heal another creature.
You seem fiercer, gaining a +[1] bonus to Intimidation.
While playing the drums, you gain a +[1] bonus to Performance checks and a +[2]-foot bonus to your Speed.
While playing this instrument, you gain a +[1] bonus to Intimidation and Performance.
While playing this instrument, you gain a +[1] bonus to Diplomacy and Performance.
This staff allows it's weilder to see and act in inclement weather.
Attempt a Strike using the staff. That Strike deals 2d4 additional cold damage.

2 Actions
Range touch
Targets 1 creature
Duration 20 minutes
The target's skin hardens like the stone of a mountain face. It gains resistance 5 to physical damage, except adamantine. Each time the target is hit by a bludgeoning, piercing, or slashing attack, mountain resilience's duration decreases by 1 minute.
Heightened (6th) The resistance increases to 10.

Wreathe your body in flames that shed light in a [1] radius, provide <LSTag Tooltip="Resistant">Resistance</LSTag> to Cold damage, and retaliate against melee attacks. Grants the Shield Block action and reaction.

Wreathed in scorching flames.

Affected entity sheds light in a [2] radius, has Resistance to Cold damage, and deals [1] to anyone who hits it with a melee attack.

3 Actions
You raise a blazing wall that burns creatures passing through it. You create either a 5-foot-thick wall of flame in a straight line up to 60 feet long and 10 feet high, or a 5-foot-thick, 10-foot-radius ring of flame with the same height. The wall stands vertically in either form; if you wish, the wall can be of a shorter length or height. Everything on each side of the wall is concealed from creatures on the opposite side. Any creature that crosses the wall or is occupying the wall's area at the start of its turn takes 4d6 fire damage.
Create a wall of pliable, twisted thorns surrounded by <LSTag Type="Status" Tooltip="ENSNARED_VINES">Entangling</LSTag> vines.

They deal [1] per turn, and quarter the movement speed of all creatures walking through it.

You summon a phantasmal minion. A phantasmal minion's body is made of magical force. It can't use attack actions. Though it has no physical weight, it can move and interact with other objects and creatures.
Dark and suitably moody, these gloves are perfect for wearing while thinking about poetry.

Enclose a target in a sphere of shimmering force.

Affected entity is impervious to all spell effects and damage, and cannot cast spells, deal damage, or move.
The sphere reduces the target's <LSTag Tooltip="MovementSpeed">movement speed</LSTag> by half, and also prevents it from casting spells or dealing damage.
You create an immobile globe around yourself. It attempts to counter any spell from outside the globe whose area or projectiles enter it.

Wreathed in scorching flames.

[one-action] The spell has a range of touch.
[two-action] The spell has a range of 30 feet and restores an additional 8hp per spell rank.

Bind to your main hand weapon. Its damage becomes magical, you cannot drop or throw it, and you become <LSTag Tooltip="WeaponProficiency">Proficient</LSTag> with it if you weren't already. When you attack with this weapon, there is a chance that <LSTag Type="Status" Tooltip="HEXBLADES_CURSE">Hexblade's Curse</LSTag> will be applied to the target.

2 Actions
You unleash a beam of divine energy. Make a ranged spell attack against the target's AC. On a hit, the target takes 2d4 spirit damage (double damage on a critical hit).
Heightened (+1) The damage increases by 1d4.
An arc of lightning leaps from one target to another.

2 Actions
Range 500 feet
Targets 1 creature
Strike an enemy with lightning. Three more bolts will leap from the target, electrifying as many as twenty other enemies within [1].
An arc of lightning leaps from one target to another.
Explode a corpse, causing it to impale those around it.

3 Actions
You raise a blazing wall that burns creatures passing through it. You create either a 5-foot-thick wall of flame in a straight line up to 60 feet long and 10 feet high, or a 5-foot-thick, 10-foot-radius ring of flame with the same height. The wall stands vertically in either form; if you wish, the wall can be of a shorter length or height. Everything on each side of the wall is concealed from creatures on the opposite side. Any creature that crosses the wall or is occupying the wall's area at the start of its turn takes 4d6 fire damage.
Target yourself or an ally to additionally grant the target's <LSTag Tooltip="ProficiencyBonus">Proficiency Bonus</LSTag> to their <LSTag Tooltip="AttackRoll">Attack Rolls</LSTag>.

2 Actions
Range touch
Gentle restorative magic pushes back the effects of toxins and more complex maladies. You remove curses and poisons on the target creature.

2 Actions
Area 15-foot cone
Defense Reflex
A cone of icy shards bursts from your spread hands and coats the targets in a layer of frost. You deal 2d4 cold damage to creatures in the area; they must each attempt a Reflex save.
Heightened (+1) The damage increases by 2d4.

2 to 3 Actions
Freezing winds extend from your hands, pushing away from you with great force. If you Cast this Spell with 2 actions, it has an area of a 60-foot cone; if you Cast this Spell with 3 actions, it has a range of 500 feet and an area of a 30-foot burst. Each creature in the area takes 10d6 cold damage with a basic Reflex save. Snowdrifts and icy gales fill the area until the start of your next turn, making the area difficult terrain.
Heightened (+1) The damage increases by 2d6.

2 to 3 Actions
Freezing winds extend from your hands, pushing away from you with great force. If you Cast this Spell with 2 actions, it has an area of a 60-foot cone; if you Cast this Spell with 3 actions, it has a range of 500 feet and an area of a 30-foot burst. Each creature in the area takes 10d6 cold damage with a basic Reflex save. Snowdrifts and icy gales fill the area until the start of your next turn, making the area difficult terrain.
Heightened (+1) The damage increases by 2d6.

3 Actions
Range 120 feet
Area 20-foot burst
Defense basic Reflex
Duration 1 minute
You create a gray storm cloud that pelts creatures with an icy deluge. When you Cast the Spell, a burst of magical hail deals 2d8 bludgeoning damage and 2d8 cold damage to each creature in the area below the cloud (basic Reflex save). Snow and sleet continue to rain down in the area for the remainder of the spell's duration, making the area difficult terrain.
Heightened (+2) The initial bludgeoning damage and cold damage increase by 1d8 each

2 Actions
Range touch
Targets 1 creature
Duration 10 minute
A shield of elemental energy protects a creature against one type of energy damage. Choose acid, cold, electricity, fire, or sonic damage. The target and its gear gain resistance 5 against the damage type you chose.
Heightened (4th) The resistance increases to 10, and you can target up to two creatures.

basic Reflex

2 Actions
Area 60-foot Line
Defense Fortitude
A swirling torrent of water manifests along a straight line, battering creatures and unattended objects in its path and possibly pushing them away from you. The torrent deals 8d6 bludgeoning damage. Each creature in the area must attempt a basic Fortitude save; unattended objects automatically fail. Creatures and objects that fail are also knocked back 5 feet (10 feet on a critical failure).
Heightened (+1) The damage increases by 2d6.

Range 500 feet

This highly polished black wooden staff resembles an aristocrats oversized walking cane, complete with a silver head shaped like a large circus animal.
This highly polished black wooden staff resembles an aristocrats oversized walking cane, complete with a silver head shaped like a large circus animal.
This staff is tapered at the base and carved into a gem-studded twist at the top.
This staff is tapered at the base and carved into a gem-studded twist at the top.
This staff is tapered at the base and carved into a gem-studded twist at the top.
This staff of magically hardened wood is topped with a silver sculpture depicting magical runic symbols.
This bizarre staff is made from oak, capped with a cluster of eye-shaped gemstones that seem to move and undulate at the corner of your vision.
This bizarre staff is made from oak, capped with a cluster of eye-shaped gemstones that seem to move and undulate at the corner of your vision.
You are graced with memories of a saint, gaining a +[1] bonus to Religion and History.
While playing the drums, you gain a +[1] bonus to Performance checks and a +[2]-foot bonus to your Speed.
This staff allows it's weilder to see and act in inclement weather.
While wielding this staff, you gain a +1 bonus to your Fortitude and Reflex saves.
Attempt a Strike using the staff. That Strike deals 2d4 additional cold damage.
You can touch the tip of this staff to a flammable substance or object to ignite a flame.

<LSTag Type="Status" Tooltip="CHARMED">Charm</LSTag> a humanoid to prevent it from attacking you. You gain <LSTag Tooltip="Advantage">Advantage</LSTag> on Charisma <LSTag Tooltip="AbilityCheck">Checks</LSTag> in dialogue.
Enemies have Advantage on <LSTag Tooltip="SavingThrow">Saving Throws</LSTag> against being Charmed.
Command a creature to flee, move closer, freeze, drop to the ground or drop its weapon.
Command a creature to move towards you on its turn and do nothing else.
Command a creature to drop its weapon.
Command a creature to flee from you on its turn and do nothing else.
Command a creature to fall <LSTag Type="Status" Tooltip="PRONE">Prone</LSTag> on its turn.
Command a creature to halt, preventing it from moving or taking any type of action.

2 Actions
Range 30 feet
Defense Will
You dull the target's mind, depending on its Will save.
Success The target is stupefied 1 until the start of your next turn.
Failure The target is stupefied 2 for 1 minute.

2 Actions
Range 120 feet
Area 20-foot burst
Defense basic Fortitude
You accelerate the processes of decay in the area. Each living creature in the area takes 2d10 void damage with a basic Fortitude save. A creature afflicted by a disease takes a 2 circumstance penalty to this save.
Heightened (+1) The damage increases by 1d10.

Tendrils of darkness curl out from your fingertips and race through the air. You deal 2d4 void damage and 1 persistent bleed damage to living creatures in the line. Each living creature in the line must attempt a Fortitude save.
Success The creature takes half the void damage and no persistent bleed damage.
Failure The creature takes full damage.
Critical Failure The creature takes double void damage and double persistent bleed damage.
Heightened (+1) The void damage increases by 2d4, and the persistent bleed damage increases by 1.
You call upon the Void to harm life force

2 Actions
Range 120 feet
Area 20-foot burst
Duration 1 minute
Plants and fungi burst out or quickly grow, entangling creatures. All surfaces in the area are difficult terrain. Each round that a creature starts its turn in the area, it must attempt a Reflex save. On a failure, it takes a 10-foot circumstance penalty to its Speeds until it leaves the area, and on a critical failure, it's also immobilized for 1 round. Creatures can attempt to Escape to remove these effects.

The target's skin becomes tough, with a consistency like bark or wood. The target gains <LSTag Tooltip="Resistance">resistance</LSTag> [1] to bludgeoning and piercing damage and <LSTag Tooltip="Weakness">weakness</LSTag> [2] to fire.
Infuse a weapon with arcane energy. The weapon becomes magical, receiving a +[1] bonus to <LSTag Tooltip="AttackRoll">Attack</LSTag> rolls and deals an additional die of damage

2 Actions
Range 30 feet
Targets 1 creature
Defense Will
You plant fear in the target; it must attempt a Will save.
Critical Success The target is unaffected.
Success The target is frightened 1.
Failure The target is frightened 2.
Critical Failure The target is frightened 3
Heightened (3rd) You can target up to five creatures.

Range 30 feet
Targets 1 creature
Defense Will
Duration 1 minute
Illusory pain wracks the target, dealing 2d4 mental damage and 1d4 persistent mental damage with a Will save.
Success The target takes full initial damage but no persistent damage, and the spell ends immediately.
Failure The target takes full initial and persistent damage, and the target is sickened 1. If the target recovers from being sickened, the persistent damage ends and the spell ends.
Heightened (+1) The damage increases by 2d4 and the persistent damage by 1d4.

2 Actions
Range 30 feet
Targets 1 creature
Defense Will
A heap of insults and invectives spew from your mouthwords so devastating your foes burn from the intensity of your diatribe. Your words deal 2d6 persistent fire damage, and the target must attempt a Will save.
Success The target takes half the persistent fire damage.
Failure The target becomes frightened 1 and takes the full persistent fire damage.
Critical Failure The target becomes frightened 2 and takes double the persistent fire damage.
Heightened (+2) You can target two additional creatures, and the persistent damage increases by 2d6.

You can enter a second rage, but afterward you need to catch your breath. When you Rage, you can choose to gain temporary HP from the Rage even if 1 minute hasnt passed (or a full turn if you have the revitalizing rage class feature). If you do, once this Rage ends you become fatigued until you rest for 10 minutes
Attunement to this staff has brought you closer to the natural world, granting a +[1] bonus to Nature.
You destroy the staff, unleashing a blast of arcane power in a 30- foot cone, dealing 2d6 force damage per charge remaining in the staff with a DC 30 basic Reflex save.

2 Actions
Area 30-foot cone
Defense Reflex
You destroy the staff, unleashing a blast of arcane power in a 30-foot cone, dealing 2d6 force damage per charge remaining in the staff with a DC 30 basic Reflex save. You create a wave of energy that ripples through the earth.
Heightened (+1) The damage increases by 2d6 per charge remaining in the staff.
While wielding the staff, you gain a +[1] bonus to Diplomacy
Attunement to this staff has brought you closer to the elements, granting a +[2] bonus to Arcana.

1 to 3 Actions
Range 60 feet
Targets 1 or more creatures
Defense AC
You fire a ray of heat and flame. Make a spell attack roll against a single creature. On a hit, the target takes 2d6 fire damage, and on a critical hit, the target takes double damage.
For each additional action you use when Casting the Spell, you can fire an additional ray at a different target, to a maximum of three rays targeting three different targets for 3 actions.
These attacks each increase your multiple attack penalty, but you don't increase your multiple attack penalty until after you make all the spell attack rolls for blazing bolt. If you spend 2 or more actions Casting the Spell, the damage increases to 4d6 fire damage on a hit, and it still deals double damage on a critical hit.
Heightened (+1) The damage to each target increases by 1d6 for the 1-action version, or by 2d6 for the 2- and 3-action versions.

Range touch
Targets 1 creature
Duration 10 minute

Targets 1 creature
Duration 10 minute
A shield of elemental energy protects a creature against one type of energy damage. Choose acid, cold, electricity, fire, or sonic damage. The target and its gear gain resistance 5 against the damage type you chose.
Heightened (4th) The resistance increases to 10, and you can target up to two creatures.

Shoot [2] magical darts, each dealing [1]. They always hit their target.

You ward yourself with shimmering magical energy, gaining a +1 item bonus to AC and a maximum Dexterity modifier of +5. While wearing mystic armor, you use your unarmored proficiency to calculate your AC.
Heightened (4th) You gain a +1 item bonus to saving throws.

You plant fear in the target; it must attempt a Will save.
Critical Success The target is unaffected.
Success The target is frightened 1.
Failure The target is frightened 2.

Area 30-foot emanation
Duration 1 round
Enemies within the area are frightened 1. They can't reduce their frightened value below 1 while they remain in the area.

Make a <LSTag Tooltip="Performance">Performance</LSTag> check against each foe adjacent to either you or your beast minion. On a success, they are <LSTag Tooltip="FRIGHTENED">frightened 1</LSTag>, and beasts are <LSTag Tooltip="FRIGHTENED">frightened 2</LSTag>.

Prerequisites warrior muse
Area 60-foot emanation
Duration 1 round
You bolster your allies' physical strength with a hearty exhortation. You and your allies gain a +1 status bonus to Athletics checks.

Area 60-foot Emanation
Duration 1 Round
Your music sets a fast pace. You and all allies in the area gain a +10-foot status bonus to all Speeds for 1 round.

Area 60-foot Emanation
Duration 1 Round
Your song moves allies to protect themselves more effectively. You and all allies in the area gain a +1 status bonus to AC and saving throws, as well as resistance equal to half the spell's rank to physical damage.

1 Action
You can perform multiple compositions simultaneously, typically by performing in multiple ways at the same time, using special vocal techniques to double your voice, or creating occult magic that replicates your song or speech. If your next action is to cast a composition, it becomes a harmonized composition. Unlike a normal composition, a harmonized composition doesnt end if you cast another composition, and you can cast another composition on the same turn as a harmonized one. Casting another harmonized composition ends any harmonized composition you already have in effect.

Your voice calls a storm of songbirds that whirl around you and peck at your enemies. All creatures within the area of whirling birds become concealed, and all creatures outside the area become concealed to creatures within it. A creature other than you that enters or ends its turn in the area takes 1d6 piercing damage as the birds peck at it.

<LSTag Type="Status" Tooltip="CHARMED">Charm</LSTag> a humanoid to prevent it from attacking you. You gain <LSTag Tooltip="Advantage">Advantage</LSTag> on Charisma <LSTag Tooltip="AbilityCheck">Checks</LSTag> in dialogue.
Enemies have Advantage on <LSTag Tooltip="SavingThrow">Saving Throws</LSTag> against being Charmed.
Command a creature to flee, move closer, freeze, drop to the ground or drop its weapon.
Command a creature to move towards you on its turn and do nothing else.
Command a creature to drop its weapon.
Command a creature to flee from you on its turn and do nothing else.
Command a creature to fall <LSTag Type="Status" Tooltip="PRONE">Prone</LSTag> on its turn.
Command a creature to halt, preventing it from moving or taking any type of action.

2 Actions
Area 10-foot emanation
You fill the minds of your enemies with doubt. Enemies in the area must succeed at a Will save or take a 1 status penalty to attack rolls as long as they are in the area. Once per round on subsequent turns, you can Sustain the spell to increase the emanation's radius by 10 feet and force enemies in the area that weren't yet affected to attempt another saving throw. Bane can counteract bless.
Command a creature to halt, preventing it from moving or taking any type of action.
You cannot use <LSTag Type="Spell" Tooltip="Target_Coda_TrueStrike">Sure Strike</LSTag> for [1] minutes.
Gain <LSTag Tooltip="Advantage">Advantage</LSTag> on your next <LSTag Tooltip="AttackRoll">Attack Roll</LSTag> this turn.

2 Actions
Range 120 feet
Area 10-foot burst
Defense None
Duration 1 minute
You create a cloud of mesmerizing patterns and colors that hovers in the air. Creatures are dazzled while inside the cloud.
<LSTag Type="Status" Tooltip="CONFUSION">Confuse</LSTag> a group of creatures, causing them to attack at random, wander around aimlessly, and occasionally skip turns in the stupor.

2 Actions
Range touch
Targets 1 living creature
Defense basic Fortitude
Your touch leeches the lifeblood out of a target to empower yourself. You deal 6d6 void damage to the target. You regain Hit Points equal to half the void damage the target takes (after applying resistances and the like).

2 Actions
Range 120 feet
Targets 1 living creature
Defense Will
You force the target to see a vision of its own death. It takes 8d6 mental damage with a Will save.
Success The target takes half damage and is frightened 1.
Failure The target takes full damage and is frightened 2.
Heightened (+1) The damage increases by 2d6.

2 Actions
Range 30 feet
Area 10-foot burst
Defense basic Fortitude
A cacophonous noise blasts out, dealing 2d10 sonic damage. Each creature must attempt a Fortitude save.
Heightened (+1) The damage increases by 1d10.

2 Actions
Range 30 feet
Targets 1 creature
Duration 1 minute
Magic empowers the target to act faster. It gains the quickened condition and can use the extra action each round for only Strike and Stride actions.
Make yourself or a target immune to <LSTag Type="Status" Tooltip="FRIGHTENED">Frightened</LSTag> and gain [1] each turn.

2 Actions
Duration 8 hours
You augment your flesh with the energies typically used to manipulate the undead. You gain 10 temporary Hit Points.
Heightened (+1) The temporary Hit Points increase by 3.

2 Actions
Range 30 feet
Area 1 object
A high-frequency sonic attack shatters a nearby object. You deal 2d10 force damage to the object, ignoring the object's Hardness.
Heightened (+1) The damage increases by 1d10.

2 Actions
Incapacitation
Range 30 feet
Targets 1 creature
Defense Will
Duration varies
You block the target's motor impulses before they can leave its mind, freezing target in place. The target must attempt a Will save.
Success The target is stunned 1.
Failure The target is paralyzed for 1 round.

2 Actions
Range touch
Targets 1 willing creature
Duration 1 minute
The target makes no sound, preventing creatures from noticing it using hearing alone. The target can't use sonic attacks, nor can it use auditory actions. This also prevents the target from casting spells due to the magical words involved in casting, with the exception of subtle spells.
Heightened (4th) The spell creates an aura in a 10-foot emanation around the touched creature, silencing all sound in or passing through it. While within the aura, creatures are subject to the same effects as the target. Depending upon the position of the effect, a creature might notice the lack of sound reaching it (blocking off the noise coming from a party, for example).

2 Actions
Range 30 feet
Defense Will
You dull the target's mind, depending on its Will save.
Success The target is stupefied 1 until the start of your next turn.
Failure The target is stupefied 2 for 1 minute.

2 Actions
Range 120 feet
Area 10-foot burst
Defense None
Duration 1 minute
You create a cloud of mesmerizing patterns and colors that hovers in the air. Creatures are dazzled while inside the cloud.
Unlock an object that is held shut by a mundane lock.
Expend 1 staff charge and 1 Rank [1] spell slot to cast a spell from the staff of the same rank as the expended spell slot.
Free Action Expend [1] staff charge and [1] spell slot to cast a spell from the staff of the same rank (or lower) as the expended spell slot.

Spells that cost an action cost a bonus action instead.

Costs [1] Sorcery Points per spell.
Something ancient and unknowable speaks to you from beyond the stars or below the earth.

Your arms turn into long, pliable tentacles, increasing your reach when youre delivering touch range spells and making unarmed Strikes with your arms (such as fist and claw Strikes) to 10 feet. This doesnt change the reach of your melee weapon attacks. During the duration, whenever you Cast a Spell, you can add an additional action to that spells casting to temporarily extend your reach to 20 feet to deliver that spell.
